      • list

        public java.util.List<FabricDiskInfo> list()
        Gets all disks

        API Call: GET /vdc/fabric/disks

        Returns:
        A list of disks on the fabric

      • list

        public java.util.List<FabricDiskInfo> list(int index,
                                  int max)
        Gets a specified set of disks

        API Call: GET /vdc/fabric/disks?index={index}&max={max}

        Parameters:
        index - index where to start in the list of items
        max - maximum number of items to return, or -1 if all
        Returns:
        A list of disks on the fabric

      • get

        public DiskInfo get(java.net.URI id)
        Gets information about a fabric disk

        API Call: GET /vdc/fabric/disks/{id}

        Parameters:
        id - Gets all disks on the fabric
        Returns:
        A list of disks on the fabric

      • getCapacity

        public Capacity getCapacity(java.net.URI id)
        Gets the capacity of a disk

        API Call: GET /vdc/fabric/disks/{id}/capacity

        Parameters:
        id - The disk
        Returns:
        The capacity information for the disk
